name: bksr
description: Run and test your Buildkite pipeline steps locally, just as they'd run in CI, using the buildkite-agent itself.
author: Tim Lucas (http://toolmantim.com)

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run pkg && npm publish && open pkg/compressed && open "$(node -e 'p=require("./package.json"); console.log(`https://github.com/${p.repository}/releases/new?tag=v${p.version}`)')"
scripts.pkg: rm -rf *.tgz pkg && mkdir -p pkg && npm pack && mv *.tgz pkg && cd pkg && tar -zxvf *.tgz && rm *.tgz && tar -czf bksr.tgz -C package . && rm -rf package && open .
